page.title: 16 CRANK:OPINION & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The employment in Crank consists of farming,work in the pub.,the school,the shop and one small car repair workshop; plus people who are self-employed.Most people work in or around St.Helens. People like living in Crank because it is a small and peaceful country village,but some say that it is boring nd unexciting.Many people think that there should be more facilities e.g. a better bus service/rail link and a fish and chip shop. People in Crank are worried about many social issues of today,including nuclear war,increasing crime,terrorism and social welfare.Most people belong to the Church of England and some attend the village's chapel.Crank has a few facilities including the village shop,the bowling green and club hut, bingo at the primary school and the bus services to St.Helens.
